snippet.title: [AMSTRAD GX4000] Copter 271 (Gameplay Run-through)
snippet.description:
I believe this was the last ever released cart game for the GX4000, and a real disappointment to end on. It was promised for ages and long delayed at the time by Loriciels a French company, but it never made it to UK shores in the end and very few copies managed to hit the shelves in France. So this has become one of the rarest games on the system too, fetching prices of between £100 and once £400 a few years ago!! Definitely not worth the money, but hey if you need it for your collection....

Anyway, I have a quick play though of the game, and within 1 minute of playtime you can see all the problems this game has.....

For more info please see -
http://gx4000.co.uk/gamebase/games.php?game=copter271

gx4000.co.uk score : 56%
